apata gahannath puluwan ,marannath puluwan, ese karalath puruduyi kiya, me rate pradhana deshapalana bhumikawaka niratha wena deshapalana nayakayek kiyanawa.ee kiyanne oonama deyak sidu kirima sandaha pimbaurupath hadala sudanam kiyalayi.haththawa asuata asunawaya warshawala athi wu awasanantha thaththwaya uda karanna.ee nisa wisheshayen mahinda rajapaksha parshwaye pakshikayanta kiyanawa prashna athi kara ganna epa kiyala.janatha depala mahajana jiwitha aaraksha karana, aaraksha wana widihata , mathiwarana nithi walata anukula wana widihata mathiwarana wyaparaya meheyawanna kiyala.

memagin wargikaranayedi boho paryaya pada idiripath kara thibuni:
apa swamin wahansela mema somawathi chaithya rajayanan wahanse soyagena paminena wita ee thulin wishesha kahapata balawath aaloka dharawak nikuth wennata patan gena thibe.

eeta amatharawa aasiyanu olimpik kamituwe saha aasiyanu podurajya mandalayiya krida sammelanaye da wiwidha thanathuru darana hethema samagam paripalakayaku da wana athara shri lanka telikom aayathanaye saha guwanthotupala adhikariye da hitapu sabhapathiwarayeki.
ema thorathuru illa kala abhiyachanaya thorathuru komasaris wisin prathikshepa kara atha.
niwase pahatha malaye salaye hatagath ginna ihala malayata pathira gos athi bawa peni gos thibena bawa polis niladhariyek pawasiya.

kese wethath kosgoda ,nanathota ,nelligas kale padinchi dharma kirthi tharaka perera wijesekara nohoth kosgoda tharaka hitapu yudha hamuda injineru balaka sebaleki.namin dharmakirthi wuwath hamawitama adharmikawa katayuthu kala ohu pathala kalli nayaka makadure madushge prathiwadi kalli nayakayeku lesa salake.emenma madushta hithawadi kosgoda sujige kalliya samaga nithara gatum athi kara ganna ohuge nama idiriye nama giya aparadha rasak satahan wi thibe. 2017 wasare nowambar masa 29 wani dina gini awi walin wedi thaba uuragasmanhandiya yudapitiye di gajamuni mahinda prema raja da soyisa,ayesh dhananjaya da soyisa ha dumidu wishmitha da soyisa yana thidena ghathanaya kirima ohu athulu pathala kalliya wisin sidu kara atha.

sahanya bayawechcha para duwanna patan gaththa..eewunata sahanyage hitha kiwwa "ehema bayawela duwanna tharam durwala wenna narakayi" kiyala..sahanya walakula lanwechcha welawaka wachana unda widda walakula hilwenna..eetapasse sulisulangak wage walakula sahanya wate ethenna gaththa..yanna nodenna kitikitiye hira karala allagaththe aadarekata neweyi wedi thiwwa tharaha pirimahagannayi kiyala husma hirawena asseth sahanyata notheruna neweyi..oona deyak wedden kiyala sahanya katha keruwa..walakulata oona wune na parada wenna..eeka nisa hirakaranna bari duraka innakota pandara kol karala aharawanna wage napurukam karanna walakulata oona wuna..eeth sahanya eewa bharagaththe hurathal dangak widiyatayi..kochchara wedi thibbath aa hitha yatin eewata hina wuna..walakula aththata dakkama rawwa..

mema nawa wyapruthiya sandaha asthamenthugatha samastha wiyadama rupiyal biliyana 14.5 k wanu athayi ganan bala thibe.mehi palamu karyaya lesa pudgalayin handuna ganime daththa thanpath kirima sandaha widyuth daththa gabadawak departhamenthuwe sthapitha kirimata niyamithaya.me anuwa pudgalayin liyapadinchi kirime daththa gabadawa anusarayen nawina sanketha sahitha aarakshitha widyuth jathika handunumpatha mahajanathawata handunwa denu labe.rajya aayathana, wisheshayen banku ha mulya aayathana saha wenath aayathanawalata awashya wu wita saka katayuthu pudgalayaku sambandhayen kshanikawa thorathuru laba ganimata haki wanu atha.diyunu ratawala pudgalayange siyalu ganudenu ha sewawan sidu karanu labanne jathika handunumpatha ho ee ha samana anka padanam karagenaya.

diyagama mahinda rajapaksha krida pitiyedi pawathwena malala krida tharagawaliyedi akuramboda wirakappetipola jathika pasale aruna darshana ehidi thath. 47.19ka kalayak satahan karamin ran padakkama dinaganiddi thath. 47.67ka kalayak satahan kala kolambaa lumbini widuhale tharusha dhananjayata ridi padakkama himiwiya.
